description:
calibre is the one stop solution to all your e-book needs.

calibre is an e-book manager. It can view, convert, edit and catalog e-books in all of the major e-book formats. It can also talk to e-book reader devices. It can go out to the internet and fetch metadata for your books. It can download newspapers and convert them into e-books for convenient reading. It is cross platform, running on Linux, Windows and macOS.
New features
- E-book viewer: Highlights panel: Show the date for highlights in the tooltip when hovering over a highlight
  Closes tickets: 2131619
- Comments editor: When changing case preserve as much text formatting as feasible
- Comments editor: Add shortcuts for case change operations. Select some text, right click and see the case change menu for the shortcuts
  Closes tickets: 2131158
Bug fixes
- Editing book list: Be robust against the book list changing in the background when a book is auto added or similar while a cell is being edited
  Closes tickets: 2131622
- Edit book: Fix a memory leak in the HTML syntax highlighter
  Closes tickets: 2130880
- calibredb list: Fix identifier values not being shown. Fixes #2131557
New news sources
- Hack a Day by Rui Rebelo
Improved news sources
- Guardian
